Package com.tradingCardInventory.model

Class Collection

java.lang.Object
com.tradingCardInventory.model.Collection
public class Collection extends Object
Represents a user's card collection. Handles operations such as adding, searching, displaying, and modifying card quantities.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs a new, empty Collection.

      public Collection()

  • Method Details

    • changeAmount

      public boolean changeAmount(double amount)
      Modifies the current amount by the specified value.
      Parameters:
      amount - the value to add (positive or negative)
      Returns:
      true if the resulting amount is non-negative; false otherwise

    • getAmount

      public double getAmount()
      Returns the current amount.
      Returns:
      the current amount

    • addCard

      public void addCard(String cardName, Rarity rarity, Variant variant, Double value)
      Adds a new card to the collection based on its details. Creates a new Card object and adds it to the list.
      Parameters:
      cardName - the name of the card
      rarity - the rarity of the card
      variant - the variant of the card
      value - the base value of the card Postcondition: - The new card is added and the collection is sorted alphabetically by name.

    • addCard

      public void addCard(Card card)
      Adds an existing Card object to the collection.
      Parameters:
      card - the card to add Postcondition: - The card is added and the collection is sorted by name.

    • changeCardCount

      public boolean changeCardCount(String name, int count)
      Changes the count of a card in the collection. Increments or decrements based on the count parameter.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the card
      count - the number to add or subtract (e.g., -1 to decrease by one)
      Returns:
      true if the change was successful; false otherwise

    • searchCard

      public Card searchCard(String name)
      Searches for a card in the collection by name (case-insensitive).
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the card to search for
      Returns:
      the matching Card object if found, or null if not found

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      Checks if the collection has no cards with a positive count.
      Returns:
      true if all cards have a count of 0; false otherwise

    • getAllCards

      public List<Card> getAllCards()
      Returns the full list of cards in the collection.
      Returns:
      a list of Card objects

    • getCard

      public Card getCard(String name)
      Retrieves a specific card by name (case-insensitive).
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the card
      Returns:
      the Card object if found; null otherwise
